features: Safely and effectively removes food stains, grease, coffee, red wine, blood and more. This versatile product can be used on car interiors, home furniture, rugs and much more.
Pet stains can be problematic and difficult to deal with, Guardsman Stain & Odor Eliminator is effective on urine, pet stains and other common household stains.
Binds and eliminates odors as it cleans, leaving your furniture smelling fresh and clean.
Safe for use on most household fabrics, upholstery and rugs. Not appropriate for use on velvet, silk or other items carrying manufacturer's cleanability codes of S or X.
body.description: Guardsman Stain & Odor Eliminator safely and effectively removes food stains, grease, coffee, red wine, blood and more. Also effective on urine, pet stains and other common household stains. This versatile product is great for car interiors, home furniture, rugs and much more. Eliminates odors as it cleans. Safe for use on most household fabrics, upholstery and rugs. Not appropriate for use on velvet, silk or other items carrying manufacturer's cleanability codes of S or X. Guardsman has been a leader in furniture care since 1915, delivering quality products and services for the protection, care, and repair of wood, fabric, and leather furnishings and bedding products. Backed by the strength of the Guardsman Corporation, the world’s largest supplier of wood finishes to the furniture and cabinet industry, Guardsman products include polishes and cleaners for fine wood, leather, and fabric furniture, as well as a complete line of furniture maintenance products for touch-up, repair and spot cleaning. Guardsman is also a leading provider of furniture repairs services. We visit hundreds of thousands of homes every year to successfully repair furniture—so you know our products work! With nearly a century of expertise in the furniture care business, Guardsman is an established, secure, and committed partner in maintaining the beauty and extending the life of your furniture.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Excellence in Furniture Since 1915 Guardsman has been delivering quality products and services for the protection, care, and repair of fine furnishings. Guardsman products include polishes and cleaners for fine wood, leather, and fabric furniture, as well as a complete line of furniture maintenance products for touch-up, repair and spot cleaning. For difficult jobs, Guardsman offers a complete line of professional repair services. Stain & Odor Eliminator Remove stains, grease, red wine and pet odors Developed by furniture experts to remove the toughest stains and odors. Guardsman Stain & Odor Eliminator for Fabrics safely and effectively removes stains, grease, coffee, red wine, blood and more without damaging your fabrics. Safe for use on most household fabrics, upholstery and rugs. Spray soiled area until damp. Gently blot with clean colorfast cloth. Repeat as needed until stain is gone.

Safe for Most Household Fabrics Host the holidays, entertain guests, invite Fido on the couch for a scratch. With Guardsman Stain & Odor Eliminator, your fabric is safe from accidental spills, pet odors and ambitious toddlers! Guardsman Stain & Odor Eliminator is not intended for use on velvet, silk or other items carrying manufacturer's cleanability codes of S or X.

Red Wine? No Problem! Don't let a small accident destroy your favorite piece of furniture. With Guardsman, stain removal is a breeze. Specially made for most household fabrics, a simple spray, blot and dry will have your furniture looking like new in no time.

After Cleaning, Protect with Guardsman Fabric Defense Apply Guardsman Fabric Defense to new or recently cleaned furniture to proactively protect against future stains. This long-lasting stain protection helps furniture look newer, longer. (Sold separately.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product for years. It has a slight scent, but nothing that lingers too long on the furniture. I can’t attest to it removing odors. I try very hard to keep my new fabric sofa covered and in shape. My golden retriever loves to get on the sofa and commence to licking her paws which has left some saliva stains on the sofa. I used this product right away and removed the stain. My other pup left a mud print on the sofa and again, I removed the stain. I did however left the mud to dry so I could brush off before I used the product. My worse case was shortly after we bought our sofa. After having a color war with chalk bombs, my granddaughter came in and laid on our sofa. I had bright pink chalk that covered it! I was mortified, but my son thought nothing of it. After they left I gently cleaned every inch with this cleaner. Some I left to dry for another pass the next day. I did get it all out and then scotch guarded the fabric again for protection. I was impressed and my husband wasn’t throwing fits all day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We received this product as a sample with our new furniture over a year ago. We used the sample quickly due to the dogs. I recently had another stain appear on my throw rug. I ordered a new bottle, and after three rounds of treatment, the stain was gone. The scent is mild, yet effective. Great value for the money. I will keep this on hand!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best upholstery stain remover
reviews.reviewText: Got this from haverty and loved it so much that ordered it here. I have used this product for spills since my son was 6 months old and he is now 4 years old. Removes stains everytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Everyone needs this!
reviews.reviewText: We used this at my parents’ house when their dog went to the bathroom on the rug. It worked so well that we decided it was a must-have with a toddler at home. We are getting new furniture ourselves, and I feel much more secure with this product ready to combat stains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really gets red wine out of apoulstry
reviews.reviewText: New Year’s Eve, some drunken buffoon (me) spilled red wine on my off-white easy chair. I had a small sample bottle of this product and immediately used it according to the instructions on the packaging. The result was that it looks like it never happened! So I bought a full size bottle to have in case something like that happens again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Stain Remover
reviews.reviewText: I received a sample of this stain remover with a new couch from Havertys. It worked so well, I bought an entire container of it! It works to get daily dirt and smudges, but the best part is, it works to get ink, chocolate, and so much more out. 10/10 recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: This is TOTALLY worth it. If you have kids, pets, don’t even second guess it. I cleaned the arms to my 16 year old cream colored sofa and they look brand new! The most amazing part is it magically got ride of the water stains left from previous cleaning experiences that I had tried my best to remove with other cleaners. It also dissolved ink in moments after applying. Will buy again and have already recommended to anyone I know with children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I thought other reviews were quite generous
reviews.reviewText: I didn't find this product to work well.
Works great but too small for the cost.

reviews.reviewTitle: leaked all over the box during delivery
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed to receive this product to find out it had leaked all over the box. have not used the actual cleaner yet but lost about 1/4 of it.
